commentBody: It has been reported that Donald Trump has been hopping, skipping, jumping and doing somersaults on the streets of New York. He's is so thankful, thrilled and relieved that American voters that did not vote for him. So happy. So happy. This is the first time that so many New Yorkers have seen him smile and giggle so much. Alas, this is just a one day event though. He will be getting his Twitter account back tomorrow. So sad. So sad.
